name: Wool mix pencil skirt
description:
For a more formal look, pencil skirt has a back vent and a darted waist,  Available in  super soft 50/50 wool mix, giving warmth and easy care.

Invisible side zip and hook & bar fastening

name: Polka dot full flare skirt
description:
Gentle gathering from the waistband gives this a wonderful full skirt.  Optional trim adds a professional finish.  The high quality heavy cotton gives this skirt a stunning finish.

Longer length and high waistband gives a fun bobby-soxer look!  Skirt measures approx 24" in length from the bottom of the waistband; can be supplied shorter.

Invisible side zip 

Very full uses almost a full 2 metres of fabric.

name: Strawberry blue easy make skirt
description:
100% cotton
Elasticated waistband
2 patch pockets
A lovely easy skirt for beginners, The casing is separate to the skirt which gives a lovely hang. The pockets are easy to make but the kit can be supplied without the pockets if required.
This can be constructed in 2 - 3 hours, whizz up the sides, whizz on the casing, thread through the elastic and then hem – the hem takes the longest! The lila skirt uses the selvedge so hemming is not required (the one hour skirt??). This fabric is so lovely it is well worth using, hemming took me just under an hour, get a cuppa and watch your fave programme!

name: Deep rose pleated skirt
description:
The pleats are easy to create and are spaced perfectly to give a very professional finish.  The internal facing is double stitched to give a lovely smooth top.  The finished article looks like it has been done by an experience dressmaker.

100% cotton, lovely medium weight deep rose with rose print.  3 box pleats front and back

name: Lilac Skirt
description:
This is the easiest of skirts!
As with the previous one, the casing is separate to the skirt which gives a lovely hang.  The skirt is double layered, with the underlayer being longer which creates the border effect.
This can be constructed in less than 2 hours, whizz up the sides, whizz on the casing, thread through the elastic  and you are done – the fabric is cut along the selvedge  so no need to hem!


100% cotton, elasticated waist, no hemming
